On a flight of fancy, I set up heritrix to crawl the New York Times.

I get a lot of references to the login page which I set up a 
credential for.  The credential goes:

credential-domain: nytimes.com
login-uri:         www.nytimes.com/auth/login
http-method:       POST
form-items:        USERID -> cpunks2
                   PASSWORD -> cpunks2

What am I doing wrong?

-Phil/CERisE
